snippet: Lumber Liquidators has pleaded guilty to environmental crimes related to its importation of illegally sourced wood products.
abstract: Lumber Liquidators pleads guilty to environmental crimes related to its importation of illegally sourced wood products.
lead_paragraph: Lumber Liquidators has pleaded guilty to environmental crimes related to its importation of illegally sourced wood products.

headline.print_headline: Lumber Liquidators to Pay for Environmental Crimes
